Author: DistractedBones
Text: Could it also be malnutrition? Before I was very overweight (434 lbs) and I was constantly hungry. I'm not 100% sure but I think I might have just been malnourished and that's why I was hungry all the time. Even being painfully full I still wanted to eat. I basically just lived on carbs, lots of bread, pizza, cereal, frozen burritos. My thinking is maybe if I ate more balanced then I would have been satisfied and not needed to eat as much.  I ended up doing keto and fasting and lost all the weight but now I'm terrified of going back to my old self so I find it hard to allow myself to eat but I also crave getting to a lower weight as it's one of the only things that makes me happy. From the fasting I've gotten used to the hunger and it no longer bothers me. When I have tried to recover I've gotten extreme hunger and it reminds me of my old constant hunger. Maybe your dad is in the same situation. I remember being frustrated that I would eat until my stomach would hurt and then maybe an hour later i'd be wanting to eat again. Nothing satisfied my hunger and towards the end I kinda hated eating since it was never ending. Because of this I lived on Soylent for a few months before keto but that only made me crave food more.  I found this video interesting in regards to always being hungry and being overweight. https://youtu.be/KHaCKudtVi0
